Title: Object: Papyrus Sallier 1
Description: Papyrus Sallier I; sheet 5; Hieratic literary text recto and verso. Late Egyptian Miscellanies. Recto: col 7.1-7.8 "The profession of a Scribe is superior", col 7.9-8.2 "The Idle Scribe", col 8.2-8.7 "Prayer to Thoth", col 8.7-8.11 "Eulogy of Merenptah" Verso: Teaching of Amenemhat.
Curator's comments: Miscellany Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. 84-7 Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. 317-25 Published: F. Adrom, Die Lehre des Amenemhet (BAe 19, 2006). Translation of Amenemhat: Parkinson, The Tale of Sinuhe and other Ancient Egyptian Poems 1940-1640 BC (Oxford World's Classics 1999), 203-11.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (322164) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/322164)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: Nov 2003-Jul 2005. Germany: Hamm, Schallaburg, Mannheim, Hannover. "War & Peace."
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: powdery Black ink Red ink Backed: white paper Backed: glassine paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: fair
